title: TEMPLATE: Maintenance task — {{title}}
description:
## Context
{{context}}

## Goal
{{goal}}

## Checklist
- Identify scope and blast radius (site-wide vs single post vs assets)
- Prefer editing theme overrides in `layouts/` and `assets/` (don’t edit `themes/` directly)
- If touching images: rename descriptively, convert to WebP (`cwebp` for stills, `gif2webp` for animations), remove originals, update Markdown links + meaningful alt text
- If touching letter art: it lives in `assets/letters/` and is Git LFS managed

## Validation
- Run `make build` (primary check is clean `hugo --minify` build)
- If relevant, run `make serve` to spot-check the change

## Notes
- Install/pull LFS assets before building if needed: `git lfs install && git lfs pull`
- Keep changes minimal and consistent with existing Hugo/SCSS patterns

{{goal}}

- Keep post-specific images alongside the Markdown in `content/posts/{{post_slug}}/`
- Use meaningful alt text for all images

- Rename imported assets to descriptive filenames
- Convert PNG/JPEG to WebP (`cwebp`) and GIF to WebP (`gif2webp`) while preserving intent
- Remove originals after conversion and update Markdown links

## Validation
- Run `make build`
- Optional preview: `make serve`

title: TEMPLATE: Epic — Add Hugo multilingual (en/de/he)
description:
## Context
Implement Hugo multilingual mode using file-suffix translations (.en.md/.de.md/.he.md), add UI translations, language switcher, and RTL support for Hebrew.

## Goal
Site renders with correct language + direction attributes, UI strings translate via i18n files, a language switcher appears in the header, and RTL styling works for Hebrew.

## Scope
- In scope: hugo.toml language config; i18n/*.toml; layouts updates for lang/dir + i18n calls + switcher; SCSS RTL utilities
- Out of scope: Translating existing content (creating .de/.he markdown variants)

## Plan
- [ ] Decide approach and files to touch
- [ ] Implement changes
- [ ] Validate locally (`make build`; optionally `make serve`)
- [ ] Write/adjust docs if needed

## Notes
- Prefer overrides in `layouts/` and `assets/` (don’t edit `themes/` directly)
- Co-locate post images with their post under `content/posts/**/`

title: Add languages config to hugo.toml
description:
## Context
From `docs/plans/1_add_i18n.md`.

## Goal
Add multilingual configuration for file-suffix translation: `.en.md`, `.de.md`, `.he.md`.

## Acceptance
- `hugo.toml` defines `defaultContentLanguage = 'en'`
- `languages.en`, `languages.de`, `languages.he` are present with names/codes/weights
- Hebrew has `languageDirection = 'rtl'`

## Validation
- `make build`

title: Create i18n translation files
description:
## Context
From `docs/plans/1_add_i18n.md`.

## Goal
Add `i18n/en.toml`, `i18n/de.toml`, `i18n/he.toml` for UI strings.

## Acceptance
- `i18n/` files exist and include keys for header nav labels, brand tagline, and read-time string
- Hebrew strings are in native script

## Validation
- `make build`

title: Set dynamic lang/dir in baseof.html
description:
## Context
From `docs/plans/1_add_i18n.md`.

## Goal
Make base template set correct `lang` and `dir` attributes per language.

## Acceptance
- `layouts/_default/baseof.html` uses `lang="{{ .Site.Language.Lang }}"`
- `layouts/_default/baseof.html` sets `dir` from `.Site.Language.LanguageDirection` (default ltr)

## Validation
- `make build`

title: Use i18n keys in templates
description:
## Context
From `docs/plans/1_add_i18n.md`.

## Goal
Replace hardcoded UI strings in templates with `{{ i18n "key" }}`.

## Acceptance
- Header nav labels use i18n keys (Home/Archive/About/Contact)
- Brand tagline uses i18n key
- Footer UI strings use i18n keys where applicable

## Validation
- `make build`

title: Add language switcher to header
description:
## Context
From `docs/plans/1_add_i18n.md`.

## Goal
Add a language switcher to the header navigation.

## Acceptance
- Header renders a language switcher that iterates `$.Site.Home.AllTranslations`
- Links include `lang="{{ .Language.Lang }}"`
- Active language uses `aria-current="page"`

## Validation
- `make serve` (manual spot-check) and `make build`

title: Add RTL SCSS utilities
description:
## Context
From `docs/plans/1_add_i18n.md`.

## Acceptance
